sub_topic: Finding the area of a parallelogram.
message_1: A parallelogram has a base of 6 cm and a height of 9 cm. Find its area.
message_2:
The area of a parallelogram can be found using the formula:

Area = base × height

In this case, the base is 6 cm and the height is 9 cm. So, the area of the parallelogram is:

Area = 6 cm × 9 cm = 54 cm²
